channel.title: How to add KeyAuth to application
channel.description: How do i add KeyAuth to my Application? Like how do i bind them? My goal is to start the KeyAuth first with a nice imgui/form and after you logged in with the key my application shows up. But after the trial you cant access the Application anymore. Is this possible? And yes i watched all tutorials on youtube and so on, i just dont know how to do it like order and what to include in the code. Because i created my code in the past. So my Question is, how can i do that? Am i creating an Folder named KeyAuth then putting all files in the folder then starting and then it works like i imagined? Sry for asking i am a beginner. I hope you can help me!
